en: Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的民主党派之一，前身为中华民族解放行动委员会，接受中国共产党的政治领导。
description.en: One of the democratic parties in the People's Republic of China, formerly the Chinese National Liberation Action Committee, which accepts the political leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党创始人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党创始人之一，曾在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party, he was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党创始人之一，曾任中华人民共和国交通部长，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: One of the founders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party, he served as the Minister of Transport of the People's Republic of China and was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国农工民主党中央主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

nodes.id: 中国国民党临时行动委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党临时行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党的前身，由邓演达等人创立。
description.en: The predecessor of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party, founded by Deng Yanda and others.

nodes.id: 中华民族解放行动委员会

zh-cn: 中华民族解放行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党的前身，由中国国民党临时行动委员会改名而来。
description.en: The predecessor of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party, renamed from the Provisional Action Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党中的一个政治派别，中国农工民主党的早期党员多来自于此。
description.en: A political faction within the Kuomintang, from which many early members of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party came.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，对各民主党派进行政治领导。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China, which provides political leadership to the democratic parties.

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党是其八个民主党派之一。
description.en: The Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party is one of its eight democratic parties.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关，于1931年处决了邓演达。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the Tutelage Period, which executed Deng Yanda in 1931.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国大陆发起的一场政治运动，导致大批农工党党员被划为右派。
description.en: A political campaign launched in mainland China in 1957, which resulted in a large number of members of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party being labeled as rightists.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农工民主党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农工民主党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农工民主党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农工民主党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农工民主党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国农工民主党中央委员会主席。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Central Committee of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国交通部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国交通部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门之一。
description.en: One of the constituent departments of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 农工党党员，在反右运动中被划为右派。
description.en: A member of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party who was labeled a rightist during the Anti-Rightist Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民族解放行动委员会组织委员会书记，曾受毛泽东邀请访问延安。
description.en: Secretary of the Organization Committee of the Chinese National Liberation Action Committee, who was invited by Mao Zedong to visit Yan'an.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人。
description.en: The main leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国农工民主党前身中国国民党临时行动委员会的成立地。
description.en: The founding place of the Provisional Action Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang, the predecessor of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 由国民革命军第十九路军于福建发动的政变，中国国民党临时行动委员会参与其中，并成立了中华共和国人民革命政府。
description.en: A coup launched by the 19th Route Army of the National Revolutionary Army in Fujian, in which the Provisional Action Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang participated and established the People's Revolutionary Government of the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华共和国人民革命政府

zh-cn: 中华共和国人民革命政府

description.zh-cn: 在闽变期间于福州成立的政府，后被国民政府平定。
description.en: A government established in Fuzhou during the Fujian Rebellion, later suppressed by the Nationalist Government.

relationships.target: 中国国民党临时行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 邓演达在上海主持召开第一次全国干部会议，成立中国国民党临时行动委员会。
description.en: Deng Yanda presided over the first national cadre meeting in Shanghai to establish the Provisional Action Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 黄琪翔是中国农工民主党（及其前身）的创始人之一。
description.en: Huang Qixiang was one of the founders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party (and its predecessors).

description.zh-cn: 章伯钧是中国农工民主党（及其前身）的创始人之一。
description.en: Zhang Bojun was one of the founders of the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party (and its predecessors).

relationships.target: 中国国民党临时行动委员会

position.en: General Secretary of the Central Executive Committee

relationships.target: 中国国民党临时行动委员会

position.en: General Secretary of the Central Executive Committee

relationships.target: 中华民族解放行动委员会

position.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee

relationships.target: 中华民族解放行动委员会

position.zh-cn: 中央临时执行委员会总联络人
position.en: General Liaison of the Central Provisional Executive Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党对农工党进行政治领导。
description.en: The Communist Party of China provides political leadership to the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府于南京秘密处决邓演达。
description.en: The Nationalist Government secretly executed Deng Yanda in Nanjing.

relationships.source: 中国国民党临时行动委员会
relationships.target: 中华民族解放行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党临时行动委员会于1935年11月10日改名为中华民族解放行动委员会。
description.en: The Provisional Action Committee of the Chinese Kuomintang was renamed the Chinese National Liberation Action Committee on November 10, 1935.

relationships.source: 中华民族解放行动委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民族解放行动委员会于1947年2月改名为中国农工民主党。
description.en: The Chinese National Liberation Action Committee was renamed the Chinese Peasants' and Workers' Democratic Party in February 1947.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国交通部

description.zh-cn: 1949年9月后，章伯钧入政府任交通部长。
description.en: After September 1949, Zhang Bojun joined the government as the Minister of Transport.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，章伯钧被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Zhang Bojun was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，黄琪翔被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Huang Qixiang was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，韩兆鹗被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Han Zhao'e was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，张申府被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Zhang Shenfu was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，黄现璠被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Huang Xianfan was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，李士豪被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Li Shihao was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，李伯球被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Li Boqiu was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，张云川被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Zhang Yunchuan was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，邓昊明被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Deng Haoming was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年反右运动中，李述中被划为右派。
description.en: During the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, Li Shuzhong was labeled a rightist.

description.zh-cn: 彭泽湘受毛泽东邀请访问延安，毛泽东连续四个晚上与其恳谈。
description.en: Peng Zexiang was invited by Mao Zedong to visit Yan'an, where Mao had sincere talks with him for four consecutive nights.

relationships.target: 中华共和国人民革命政府

description.zh-cn: 闽变后，在福州成立了“中华共和国人民革命政府”。
description.en: After the Fujian Rebellion, the 'People's Revolutionary Government of the Republic of China' was established in Fuzhou.

relationships.target: 中华共和国人民革命政府

position.zh-cn: 政府委员、军事委员会参谋主任
position.en: Government Committee Member, Chief of Staff of the Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 黄琪翔为中华共和国人民革命政府十一名政府委员之一，兼任军事委员会参谋主任。
description.en: Huang Qixiang was one of the eleven government committee members of the People's Revolutionary Government of the Republic of China and concurrently served as the Chief of Staff of the Military Commission.
